summary: Building a Bluestone Bank mobile banking dashboard app with a blue color scheme, tagline 'Solid Foundation, Secure Funds', balance card, quick actions (Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, Pay Bills), recent transactions, and bottom navigation.
architectural_notes: App name: Bluestone Bank with tagline 'Solid Foundation, Secure Funds'
Color scheme: blue, matching banking dashboard reference

existing_features.title: Rebuild the Dashboard page to match the mobile banking layout shown in the reference image: a sticky top bar with a hamburger menu icon on the left, 'Bluestone Bank' branding text with the tagline 'Solid Foundation, Secure Funds' centered beneath it, and a notification bell icon with a red badge count on the right. The top bar background should use the existing dark navy/blue theme.

Add a hero balance card directly below the top bar. The card should display a personalized greeting such as 'Hello, [User Name]', a 'Your Balance' label with the live balance amount in large bold text fetched from the backend, and an 'Available Balance' label below it. Style the card with a blue gradient background matching the reference image.

Add a horizontal row of four circular quick-action buttons below the balance card: Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, and Pay Bills. Each button should have a white circular icon background and a label below it. Tapping Transfer, Deposit, or Withdraw navigates to the respective existing page routes. Pay Bills shows a Coming Soon toast. Lay them out evenly spaced in a single row.

Add a Recent Transactions section below the quick actions. It should display up to 5 of the most recent transactions, each showing a category icon, transaction name, relative date such as Yesterday or 2 Days Ago, and the amount right-aligned. Positive amounts are shown in green with a plus prefix and negative amounts in red with a minus prefix. Use the existing useTransactions hook to fetch data. Show skeleton loaders while loading and an empty state if no transactions exist.

Add a fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Home with a house icon, Accounts with a card icon, Payments with a dollar icon, and More with a three-dot icon. The active tab should be highlighted in white or accent color. The Home tab navigates to the dashboard. Accounts and Payments tabs show a Coming Soon toast if no dedicated route exists. The bottom nav must not overlap main content.

Update the Dashboard page to use a mobile-first self-contained layout without the generic Layout header and footer wrapper. The page should be max-width constrained and centered. The top section containing the top bar and balance card uses a blue/navy background. The content section below uses a white or light grey background with rounded top corners, matching the card-on-blue-header style from the reference image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Dashboard with balance card showing greeting, current balance, and available balance
Quick action buttons: Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, and Pay Bills
Recent transactions list with name, date, and color-coded amounts (green/red)
Bottom navigation with Home, Accounts, Payments, and More tabs
Top bar with hamburger menu, Bluestone Bank branding + tagline, and notification bell with badge
